P.S CAPS LOCK IS BROKEN.[/quote]
open your OSK and press the caps lock button
start->run->osk

and its not the dupe i need fixed… i need it to equip my 1h item when i click it [it goes, but disappears] it is in the “Type A” area with out any other text printed. so the “else” for the itemIs2h

item.title: FML-rewriting wear method
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

Was trying to make 2h’s 2hed so you cant wear a shield with them. and it is good… except when i try to equip a 1h weapon it just disappears =\

if you wan’t to test it in your source just make the levelREQ(int) method and have it return false(or remove it) =]

[code]public boolean itemIs2h(int item) {
if (GetItemName(item).contains(“2h”)
|| GetItemName(item).contains(“maul”)
|| GetItemName(item).contains(“longbow”)
|| GetItemName(item).contains(“shortbow”)
|| GetItemName(item).contains(" bow")
|| GetItemName(item).contains(“hammers”)
|| GetItemName(item).contains(“greataxe”)
|| GetItemName(item).contains(“godsword”)
|| GetItemName(item).contains(“spear”)
|| GetItemName(item).contains(“halberd”)) {
return true;
}
return false;
}
public boolean wear(int toWear,int invSlot) {
if (playerItems[invSlot]!=toWear+1) {
sendMessage("Conflitcting IDS: “+toWear+” "+ playerItems[invSlot]);
}
if (levelREQ(toWear)) {
return false;
}
int toWearN = playerItemsN[invSlot];//number of items to equip
int toWearT = itemType(toWear);//type of item(weapon,shield,ect.)

if (toWearT==playerWeapon) {//HAS TO DO WITH EQUIPPING A 2H'ed WEAPON
sendMessage("Type A");
	if (itemIs2h(toWear)) {
		if (playerEquipment[playerShield]!=-1) {
			 if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon]==-1) {
				sendMessage("No weapon");
				deleteItem(toWear,invSlot,toWearN);
				remove(playerEquipment[playerShield],playerShield);
				playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=toWear;
				playerEquipmentN[playerWeapon]=toWearN;
			} else if (freeSlots()>=1) {
				sendMessage("Free SLots");
				deleteItem(toWear,invSlot,toWearN);
				addItem(playerEquipment[playerWeapon],playerEquipmentN[playerWeapon]);
				remove(playerEquipment[playerShield],playerShield);
				playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=toWear;
				playerEquipmentN[playerWeapon]=toWearN;
			} else {
				sendMessage("Not enough room in your inventory.");
				return false;
			}
		} else {
			sendMessage("no shield equipped");
			deleteItem(toWear,invSlot,toWearN);
			//remove(playerEquipment[playerShield],playerShield);
			playerEquipment[toWearT]=toWear;
			playerEquipmentN[toWearT]=toWearN;
		}
	} else {
		deleteItem(toWear,invSlot,toWearN);
		addItem(playerEquipment[toWearT],playerEquipmentN[toWearT]);
		playerEquipment[toWearT]=toWear;
		playerEquipment[toWearT]=toWearN;
	}
		



} else if (toWearT==playerShield)  {//EQUPING A SHIELD while wearing a 2h'ed weapon
sendMessage("Type B");
		if (itemIs2h(playerEquipment[playerWeapon])) {
			sendMessage("IS A 2H");
			if (freeSlots()>=0) {
				sendMessage("has free slots");
					sendMessage("weapon equipped");
					deleteItem(toWear,invSlot,toWearN);
					remove(playerEquipment[playerWeapon],playerWeapon);
					playerEquipment[toWearT]=toWear;
					playerEquipmentN[toWearT]=toWearN;
			}
		} else {
			sendMessage("not a 2h");
			deleteItem(toWear,invSlot,toWearN);
			playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=toWear;
			playerEquipmentN[playerWeapon]=toWearN;
		}
} else {
	sendMessage("Type C");
	if (Item.itemStackable[toWear] && playerEquipment[toWearT] == toWear) {
		playerEquipmentN[toWearT]+=toWearN;
		playerEquipment[toWearT]=toWear;
		deleteItem(toWear,invSlot,toWearN);
		sendMessage("Part1");
	}else if (playerEquipment[toWearT]!=-1) {
		deleteItem(toWear,invSlot,toWearN);
		addItem(playerEquipment[toWearT],playerEquipmentN[toWearT]);
		playerEquipmentN[toWearT]=toWearN;
		playerEquipment[toWearT]=toWear;
		sendMessage("Part2");
	} else {
		if (playerItems[invSlot]==toWear+1) {
			deleteItem(toWear,invSlot,toWearN);
			playerEquipment[toWearT]=toWear;
			playerEquipmentN[toWearT]=toWearN;
		}
	}
	
	
}




	if (toWearT==playerWeapon||toWearT==playerShield)
		 SendWeapon(playerEquipment[playerWeapon], GetItemName(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]));

	resetItems(3214);
	/*SAVED THIS--for showing the new weapon*/
	outStream.createFrameVarSizeWord(34);
	outStream.writeWord(1688);
	outStream.writeByte(toWearT);
	outStream.writeWord(toWear + 1);
	if (toWearN > 254) {
		 outStream.writeByte(255);
		 outStream.writeDWord(toWearN);
	} else {
		 outStream.writeByte(toWearN); // amount	
	}
	outStream.endFrameVarSizeWord();
	ResetBonus();
	GetBonus();
	WriteBonus();
	updateRequired = true;
	appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

return true;
}[/code]

when i use the code i believe it says my problem is in “Type A” i used the messages as a debugger to find out what went where. also when trying to equip items if i double click them just right they get duped >.>’

Read full topic
